title: About
text:
This project was created for the Spring 2024 HIST 5454 Digital History course by Miles Abernethy.
```

title: Home
text: Welcome to the Mapping Galvanization Project! This project is designed to help visitors understand and provide visual analysis for the Civil War phenomenon known as “galvanization.”
